ComicInfo.Summary: With the vampires taking control of Gotham, Harley becomes the leader of the surviving human criminals. Jim Gordon reaches out to Harley to protect a vial of Lex Luthor's blood, which has the power to kill the vampires. Once Harley takes possession of the vial, she becomes a target for super-heroes who have been transformed into vampires.
